sentence: Another Republican from Ohio, Rep. Jim Jordan, who claims that Fauci knew the coronavirus “came from a lab,” has vowed that Republicans will investigate him if they win control of the House.
author: SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
title: Republicans, wooing Trump voters, make Fauci their boogeyman

sentence: The Columbus Dispatch Columbus, Ohio – A committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol has turned its attention to U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan.
author: Haley Bemiller
title: Jan. 6 committee seeks meeting with Rep. Jim Jordan over conversations with Trump, allies

sentence: The western portion of Delaware County — including Delaware city — would move from District 12 to 4 and be represented by Jim Jordan instead of Troy Balderson.
author: Ben Orner
title: Street-level map: Ohio congressional districts approved in March
